abstract: Agricultural Bank of China has chosen the roster of banks to handle its initial public offering, sources with direct knowledge of the matter said Wednesday, an offering expected to raise as much as $20 billion, Reuters reported.
snippet: Agricultural Bank of China has chosen the roster of banks to handle its initial public offering, sources with direct knowledge of the matter said Wednesday, an offering expected to raise as much as $20 billion, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Agricultural Bank of China has chosen the roster of banks to handle its initial public offering, sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Wednesday, in an offering expected to raise as much as $20 billion.

headline.main: China’s Ag Bank Said to Choose Underwriters

abstract: Jim Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.
snippet: Jim Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.
lead_paragraph: James S. Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.

headline.main: Chanos Sees Unfounded Euphoria in China
